title: AlarmStorageGetMessageCount (Function)
text:
FUNCTION AlarmStorageGetMessageCount : USINT
This function can be used to determine the number of messages an alarm belonging
to a given alarm group has.

rows.Name: AlarmStorageGetMessageCount
rows.Comment:
The number of messages. 0 if the corresponding information
cannot be retrieved

rows.Name: udiAlarmGroupId
rows.Comment:
The internal id of the alarm group, that was read from the
alarm storage

rows:
The internal id of the alarm, that was read from the alarm
storage
